dcterms:creator: K. Choi
J. Im
L. M. Heller
B. McFee
K. Imoto
Y. Okamoto
M. Lagrange
S. Takamichi
dcterms:description: The Foley sound dataset comprises approximately 5k class-labeled sound samples (5.4 hours) sourced from three different datasets, covering 7 Foley sound classes: DogBark, Footstep, GunShot, Keyboard, MovingMotorVehicle, Rain, Sneeze Cough.
dcterms:title: Foley sound dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Kim
M. Ghei
B. Pardo
Z. Duan
dcterms:description: The Vocal Imitation Set is a dataset of vocally imitated sound events using the audioset ontology, utilized for extracting temporal event conditions in Foley sound synthesis.
dcterms:title: Vocal Imitation Set

dcterms:creator: M. Cartwright
B. Pardo
dcterms:description: VocalSketch is a dataset for vocally imitating audio concepts, used to provide temporal event conditions for Foley sound synthesis.
dcterms:title: VocalSketch
